title: Lingo
description: Full-stack social platform with authentication, friends system, real-time chat/video, and a responsive themed UI.
bullets: Node.js and Express single-domain deployment with integrated UI + API, production scripts, and clean routing.
JWT authentication with protected routes and middleware backed by MongoDB for secure login/signup flows.
Friends system with API-based friend requests, real-time chat, and video calling via Stream SDK.
Responsive, accessible UI supporting customizable themes with Tailwind/Daisy UI.
Data reliability via TanStack Query + Axios, custom React hooks, and API testing suite.

title: Teacher's App
description: A platform built primarily in TypeScript and React.
bullets: Developed a dynamic web platform enabling teachers to manage classrooms, share announcements, assign homework, and access student details.
Managed global application state using Redux and Redux Toolkit; designed authentication flows with Material UI.
Connected to the YouTube API to fetch and display lesson videos seamlessly.
